titles.title: Honoring the success of the more-than-a-decade-long process by Southern California locals to create the San Gabriel Mountains National Monument.
Honoring the success of the more-than-a-decade-long process by Southern California locals to create the San Gabriel Mountains National Monument.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: Acknowledges the three-year anniversary of the designation of the San Gabriel Mountains National Monument in California in October 2014.
